import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import Syria from './assets/syriacover.jpg'; import Thai from './assets/thaicavecover.png'; import Crossword from './assets/nytcrossword.jpg'; import GasTracer from './assets/gastracer.gif'; class Portfolio extends Component { render() { const slideImages = [ Syria, Thai, Crossword ]; const properties = { duration: 5000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, prevArrow:
, nextArrow:
}; return (

Portfolio

1 of 5

Internship

The New York Times

As a Graphics intern on the Immersive team, I prototyped 3-D assets to visualize AR moments, researched and tested the use of the Microsoft Hololens in future articles, and created cover images and diagrams as seen here and here. During the Maker's Week Hackathon, I also helped build the front end for our intern-led 3-D Crossword project.

2 of 5

Internship

Molex

As a Product Management intern, I designed 2-D/3-D graphics and video content to market a new line of connectors. I also mocked up VR/AR visuals for web and mobile to drive the use of immersive technology in marketing.

) } } export default Portfolio;
